fiftySevenWest.summary: Promotional webpage for 57 West Capital Advisors, designed to attract customers interested in fiduciary services and actively managed equity portfolios. Provides visitors with a smooth experience, easily connecting them with company info, contact options, and a detailed look at services offered.

responsibilities.customer: Interact with the customer on a regular basis to update/maintain the webpage to their satisfaction.
responsibilities.code: Responsible for building/editing code, updating external libraries, and production deployment.
responsibilities.css: Code optimized to ensure full functionality and an optimal user experience across both desktop and mobile browsers.

fiftySevenWest.imageAlt: 57 West website for building Custom Stock Porfolios
